data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Throw-in Tokyo.
In the minute 1, In Kanagawa a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Tokyo to take a throw-in in Shonan territory.
Goal kick for Shonan at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
In the minute 3, Free kick Tokyo.
Ball goes out of play for a Tokyo goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 8, Shonan takes a corner from the left.
Tokyo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Tokyo in their own half.
In the minute 11, Corner awarded to Tokyo.
Free kick for Shonan in the half of Tokyo.
Shonan awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 16, Throw-in for Shonan at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
Free kick for Shonan in their own half.
Ball safe as Tokyo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 21, It's a goal kick for the home team in Kanagawa.
Can Tokyo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Shonan's half?
Shonan have a goal kick.
In the minute 31, Tokyo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Shonan have a goal kick.
Free kick for Tokyo in their own half.
In the minute 38, Throw-in for Tokyo in the half of Shonan.
Tokyo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Yojiro Takahagi of Tokyo smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 40, Tokyo's Adailton is on target but unsuccessful.
Tarik Elyounoussi (Shonan) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Can Shonan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tokyo's half?
In the minute 45, Adailton (Tokyo) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Tokyo.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
The second-half has started.
Tokyo make their first substitution with Kyosuke Tagawa replacing Diego Oliveira.
In the minute 47, Free kick for Shonan in the half of Tokyo.
Goal kick for Tokyo at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
Shonan to take a throw-in in Tokyo territory.
In the minute 49, Shonan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Tokyo are whistled for offside.
Throw-in for Shonan in their own half.
In the minute 53, Throw-in Shonan.
Toichi Suzuki is on a sub for Mitsuki Saito for Shonan.
Shonan drive upfield and Satoshi Tanaka gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Tokyo defender.
In the minute 56, Throw-in for Shonan at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
Free kick for Tokyo in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 59, Ball safe as Tokyo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Shonan in the half of Tokyo.
Throw-in for Shonan in the half of Tokyo.
In the minute 61, Can Shonan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tokyo's half?
The away team replace Taichi Hara with Kiichi Yajima.
Tokyo pushes forward through Adailton, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 66, Ball goes out of play for a Tokyo goal kick.
Tokyo drives forward and Kiichi Yajima gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in for Tokyo in their own half.
In the minute 68, It's a goal kick for the away team in Kanagawa.
Kyosuke Tagawa's header is off-target for Tokyo.
Tokyo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 72, Throw-in Shonan.
Tokyo are pushing forward but Adailton's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Shonan at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
In the minute 73, Temma Matsuda is replacing Akimi Barada for the home team.
Tokyo to take a throw-in in Shonan territory.
Kyosuke Tagawa of Tokyo gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 76, Satoshi Tanaka is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Satoshi Tanaka (Shonan) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Keisuke Saka.
Hiroshi Ibusuki is on a sub for Tarik Elyounoussi for Shonan.
In the minute 78, Tokyo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal! Adailton gives Tokyo a 0-1 lead.
Great play from Kyosuke Tagawa to set up the goal.
In the minute 79, It's a goal kick for the away team in Kanagawa.
Joan Oumari (Tokyo) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Throw-in for Shonan at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
In the minute 82, Toichi Suzuki (Shonan) gets a yellow card.
Sodai Hasukawa is replacing Kashifu Bangunagande for the away team.
Shonan are coming forward and Naoki Ishihara gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 84, Tokyo have a goal kick.
Free kick for Tokyo in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 87, Throw-in for Shonan close to the penalty box.
Ball goes out of play for a Tokyo goal kick.
Ball safe as Tokyo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Tokyo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Tokyo have a dangerous throw-in.
Can Tokyo capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Shonan's half?
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Shonan in their own half.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 5 minutes of added time.
Can Shonan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Tokyo's half?
In Kanagawa a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Shonan at Shonan BMW Stadium Hiratsuka.
Tokyo awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's 0-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
The away team replace Adailton with Rei Hirakawa.
Tokyo make their fifth substitution with Kiwara Miyazaki replacing Takuya Uchida.
